question: I read quran daily for 2hr,Now a days Iam unable to maintain - unable to keep the wadu for long time or wadu breaks wudu
answer:
QUESTION
AsAk I read quran daily for 2hr,Now a days Iam unable to maintain(unable to keep the wadu for long time or wadu breaks ) wadu .If I stop reading quran I feel missing a lot and uncomfortable and If I read quran with out wadu I feel Iam doing some sin.I want solution for this?
ANSWER


Share:
You should recite the Qur'aan for as long as you can maintain your Wudhu.

If your Wudhu breaks, you may renew your Wudhu and resume the recitation of
the Qur'aan if you wish to.

and Allah Ta'ala Knows Best

Mufti Ebrahim Desai
